PersistentScript.name: Healing
PersistentScript.script:
auto(100)
if $paralyzed and $mp > 40 then --and cancastspell("exura ico") then cast("exura ico") --wait(200,300) elseif $hppc > 35 and $hppc < 95 and $mp > 500 then --and maround(4, "Medusa", "Serpent", "Hydra") < 4 then -- and cancastspell("exura ico") then cast("exura ico") wait(200,300) end

PersistentScript.name: Temporary
PersistentScript.script:
auto(5000) local mainbp = getuseroption("MainBP") local supplybp = getuseroption("SuppliesBP") local lootbp = getuseroption("LootBP") local goldbp =getuseroption("GoldBP") local extrasupplybp = getuseroption("ExtraSuppliesBP")
setlootingdestination("mainbp", mainbp) setlootingdestination("supplybp", supplybp) setlootingdestination("lootbp", lootbp) setlootingdestination("goldbp", goldbp) setlootingdestination("extrasupplybp", extrasupplybp)

PersistentScript.name: SSonLvlDeath
PersistentScript.script:
init start
local Skills = { -- downgrade Death = true,
-- upgrade Level = true, Magic = false, Fist = false, Axe = false, Club = false, Sword = false, Distance = false, Shielding = false, Fishing = false }
-- DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE -- init end
auto(1000, 1200)
foreach newmessage m do if m.type == 16 then local Skill = m.content:match('You advanced .- (.-)[%s%.].-')
if Skill and Skills[Skill:capitalize()] then if $minimized then restoreclient() wait(800) focusclient() screenshot() wait(800) minimizeclient() else focusclient() screenshot() end elseif Skills.Death then local Death = m.content:match("You were downgraded (.+)")
if Death then if $minimized then restoreclient() wait(800) focusclient() screenshot() wait(800) minimizeclient() else focusclient() screenshot() end end end end end

HUDScript.name: Stats
HUDScript.script:
init start -- -- 88 -- "" ,d -- 88 -- ,adPPYba, 88 8b,dPPYba, 88,dPYba,,adPYba, ,adPPYYba, MM88MMM ,adPPYba, -- I8[ "" 88 88P' "Y8 88P' "88" "8a "" `Y8 88 a8P_____88 -- `"Y8ba, 88 88 88 88 88 ,adPPPPP88 88 8PP""""""" -- aa ]8I 88 88 88 88 88 88, ,88 88, "8b, ,aa -- `"YbbdP"' 88 88 88 88 88 `"8bbdP"Y8 "Y888 `"Ybbd8"' --
-- Name: Monitor My Stats -- Last Updated: 19/12/2013 -- Version: 1.0
filterinput(false, true, false, false)
local HUD_Sections = { {Name = 'OTHERS', State = true, Items = { {'Ping', function() return $ping .. ' (avg: ' .. $pingaverage .. ')' end}, {'Bank Balance', function() return num($balance) end}, } },
{Name = 'CHARACTER STATS', State = true, Items = { {'Level', function() return $level .. ' (' .. 100 - math.floor(($exp - expatlvl($level)) * 100 / (expatlvl($level + 1) - expatlvl($level))) .. '%)' end}, {'Experience', function() return num($exp) end}, {'Magic Level', function() return $mlevel .. ' (' .. 100 - $mlevelpc .. '%)' end}, {'Weapon Skill', function() local _ = WeaponSkill() return _.skill .. ' (' .. 100 - _.skillpc .. '%)' end}, {'Shielding', function() return $shielding .. ' (' .. 100 - $shieldingpc .. '%)' end}, {'Fishing', function() return $fishing .. ' (' .. 100 - $fishingpc .. '%)' end} } },
{Name = 'ENGINE STATES', State = true, Items = { {'Spell Healer', function() return getsetting('SpellHealer/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('SpellHealer/Enabled') end}, {'Potion Healer', function() return getsetting('PotionHealer/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('PotionHealer/Enabled') end}, {'Condition Healer', function() return getsetting('ConditionHealer/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('ConditionHealer/Enabled') end}, {'Mana Training', function() return getsetting('ManaTrainer/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('ManaTrainer/Enabled') end}, {'Cavebot', function() return getsetting('Cavebot/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('Cavebot/Enabled') end}, {'Looting', function() return getsetting('Looting/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('Looting/Enabled') end}, {'Targeting', function() return getsetting('Targeting/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('Targeting/Enabled') end} } },
{Name = 'BOTTING STATS', State = true, Items = { {'Experience per Hour', function() return num($exphour) end}, {'Experience Left', function() return num(exptolevel()) end}, {'Experience Today', function() return num($expgained) end}, {'Time to Next Level', function() return time(timetolevel()) end}, {'Played Time', function() return time(math.floor($charactertime / 1000)) end}, {'Stamina', function() return time($stamina) end} } } }
local HUD_Colors = { Font = color(255, 255, 255, 0), SectionHeaderBackground = {0.0, color(90, 12, 15, 20), 0.23, color(98, 13, 17, 20), 0.76, color(52, 6, 9, 20)}, EntryNameBackground = {0.0, color(75, 75, 75, 20), 0.23, color(45, 45, 45, 20), 0.76, color(19, 19, 19, 20)}, EntryValueBackground = {0.0, color(120, 120, 120, 20), 0.23, color(100, 100, 100, 20), 0.76, color(35, 35, 35, 20)}, EntryValueEnabledBackground = {0.0, color(65, 96, 12, 20), 0.23, color(67, 99, 13, 20), 0.76, color(36, 52, 6, 20)}, EntryValueDisabledBackground = {0.0, color(90, 12, 15, 20), 0.23, color(98, 13, 17, 20), 0.76, color(52, 6, 9, 20)}, }
function WeaponSkill() local SkillTypes = { ['axe'] = {type = 'axe', skill = $axe, skillpc = $axepc}, ['club'] = {type = 'club', skill = $club, skillpc = $clubpc}, ['sword'] = {type = 'sword', skill = $sword, skillpc = $swordpc}, ['bow'] = {type = 'distance', skill = $distance, skillpc = $distancepc}, ['distance weapon'] = {type = 'distance', skill = $distance, skillpc = $distancepc}, ['no weapon'] = {type = 'fist', skill = $fist, skillpc = $fistpc}, ['rod'] = {type = 'magic', skill = $mlevel, skillpc = $mlevelpc}, ['wand'] = {type = 'magic', skill = $mlevel, skillpc = $mlevelpc}, }
return SkillTypes[findweapontype()] end
local Moving, Temp, Moved = false, {0, 0}, {0, 0}
function inputevents(e) if (e.type == IEVENT_LMOUSEDOWN) then for _, Section in ipairs(HUD_Sections) do if (e.elementid == Section.StateSwitch) then Section.State = not Section.State return end end for _, Section in ipairs(HUD_Sections) do if (Section.Name == 'ENGINE STATES') then for _, SectionItem in ipairs(Section.Items) do if (e.elementid == SectionItem[4]) then SectionItem[3]() return end end end end end
if (e.type == IEVENT_MMOUSEDOWN) then Moving, Temp = true, {$cursor.x - Moved[1], $cursor.y - Moved[2]} end
if (e.type == IEVENT_MMOUSEUP) then Moving = false end end init end
if (Moving) then auto(10) Moved = {$cursor.x - Temp[1], $cursor.y - Temp[2]} end
setposition($clientwin.left + 5 + Moved[1], $worldwin.top + Moved[2]) setfontstyle('Tahoma', 8, 75, 0xFFFFFF, 1, color(0, 0, 0, 20))
local StringWidth, StringHeight = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 22) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.SectionHeaderBackground)) drawroundrect(0, 0, 240, 21, 2, 2) drawtext('BUGWT SCRIPTS', 6, 21 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 22) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueBackground)) drawroundrect(130, 0, 110, 21, 2, 2) drawtext('www.bugwt.com', 136, 21 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5)
setfontsize(7)
local StringWidth, StringHeight = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryNameBackground)) drawroundrect(0, 24 + 0 * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext('EK - Insane Banuta', 6, 24 + 0 * 18 + 15 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryNameBackground)) drawroundrect(0, 24 + 1 * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext('Script version:', 6, 24 + 1 * 18 + 15 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueBackground)) drawroundrect(130, 24 + 1 * 18, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext('1.0.3', 136, 24 + 1 * 18 + 15 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
local YPosition, SectionRow, SectionItemsRow = 22 + 2 * 19, 0, 0 for SectionIndex, Section in ipairs(HUD_Sections) do setfontsize(8)
local StringWidth, StringHeight = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.SectionHeaderBackground)) drawroundrect(0, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 240, 20, 2, 2) drawtext(Section.Name, 6, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 20 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) if (Section.State) then addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueEnabledBackground)) else addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueDisabledBackground)) end Section.StateSwitch = drawroundrect(220, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 20, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('X', 228, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 20 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
SectionRow = SectionRow + 1
if (Section.State) then setfontsize(7)
local StringWidth, StringHeight = measurestring('TEMP')
for SectionItemIndex, SectionItem in ipairs(Section.Items) do setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 17) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryNameBackground)) drawroundrect(0, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 240, 16, 2, 2) drawtext(SectionItem[1], 6, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 16 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
if (Section.Name == 'ENGINE STATES') then local EngineCurrentState = SectionItem[2]()
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 17) if (EngineCurrentState == 'yes') then addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueEnabledBackground)) else addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueDisabledBackground)) end HUD_Sections[SectionIndex].Items[SectionItemIndex][4] = drawroundrect(130, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 110, 16, 2, 2) drawtext((EngineCurrentState == 'yes' and ('On')) or ('Off'), 136, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 16 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1) else setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 17) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueBackground)) drawroundrect(130, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 110, 16, 2, 2) drawtext(SectionItem[2](), 136, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 16 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1) end
SectionItemsRow = SectionItemsRow + 1 end end end

HUDScript.name: MMH
HUDScript.script:
init start -- -- 88 -- "" ,d -- 88 -- ,adPPYba, 88 8b,dPPYba, 88,dPYba,,adPYba, ,adPPYYba, MM88MMM ,adPPYba, -- I8[ "" 88 88P' "Y8 88P' "88" "8a "" `Y8 88 a8P_____88 -- `"Y8ba, 88 88 88 88 88 ,adPPPPP88 88 8PP""""""" -- aa ]8I 88 88 88 88 88 88, ,88 88, "8b, ,aa -- Author: `"YbbdP"' 88 88 88 88 88 `"8bbdP"Y8 "Y888 `"Ybbd8"' -- -- Monitor My Hunting! -- -- Version: 1.0 -- Created: 29.12.2013 -- Last update: 29.12.2013 --
local MMH = { SHOW_ALL_ITEMS = false, SHOW_ALL_SUPPLIES = false, }
-- [[ Do not change anything below this line. ]] --
-- [[ COLORS ]] -- MMH.COLORS = {} MMH.COLORS.FONT_COLOR = color(255, 255, 255, 0) MMH.COLORS.SECTION_HEADER_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(90, 12, 15, 20), 0.23, color(98, 13, 17, 20), 0.76, color(52, 6, 9, 20)} MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(75, 75, 75, 20), 0.23, color(45, 45, 45, 20), 0.76, color(19, 19, 19, 20)} MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(120, 120, 120, 20), 0.23, color(100, 100, 100, 20), 0.76, color(35, 35, 35, 20)} MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(65, 96, 12, 20), 0.23, color(67, 99, 13, 20), 0.76, color(36, 52, 6, 20)} MMH.COLORS.RESULT_NEGATIVE_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(90, 12, 15, 20), 0.23, color(98, 13, 17, 20), 0.76, color(52, 6, 9, 20)} MMH.COLORS.RESET_BUTTON_BACKGROUND = MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND
-- [[ ELEMENTS ]] -- MMH.ELEMENTS = {} MMH.ELEMENTS.RESET_BUTTON = -1 MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_ITEMS_LOOTED = -1 MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_SUPPLIES_USED = -1
-- [[ SECTION STATES ]] -- MMH.SECTIONS = {} MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED = true MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED = true
-- [[ OTHERS ]] -- filterinput(false, true, false, false)
local MOVING, TEMP, MOVED = false, {0, 0}, {0, 0}
function inputevents(e) if (e.type == IEVENT_LMOUSEDOWN) then if (e.elementid == MMH.ELEMENTS.RESET_BUTTON) then resetcharactertime() resetlootcounter() resetexpcounter() elseif (e.elementid == MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_ITEMS_LOOTED) then MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED = not MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED elseif (e.elementid == MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_SUPPLIES_USED) then MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED = not MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED end end
if (e.type == IEVENT_MMOUSEDOWN) then MOVING, TEMP = true, {$cursor.x - MOVED[1], $cursor.y - MOVED[2]} end
if (e.type == IEVENT_MMOUSEUP) then MOVING = false end end init end
if (MOVING) then auto(10) MOVED = {$cursor.x - TEMP[1], $cursor.y - TEMP[2]} end
setposition($clientwin.right - 424 + MOVED[1], $worldwin.top + MOVED[2]) setfontstyle('Tahoma', 8, 75, MMH.COLORS.FONT_COLOR, 1, color(0, 0, 0, 20))
local ROW_QUANTITY, STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = 0, measurestring('TEMP') local ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH, ITEM_LOOTED_QUANTITY, ITEM_LOOTED_WORTH = 0, 0, 0 local SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH, SUPPLY_USED_QUANTITY, SUPPLY_USED_WORTH = 0, 0, 0
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 0, 240, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('Monitor My Hunting v1.0', 6, 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESET_BUTTON_BACKGROUND)) MMH.ELEMENTS.RESET_BUTTON = drawroundrect(196, 0, 44, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('RESET', 202, 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfontsize(7)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 23, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext('Looting Accuracy', 6, 23 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5 + 1)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(130, 23, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(string.format('%.2f', $lootaccuracy) .. '%', 136, 23 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5 + 1)
setfontsize(8)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.SECTION_HEADER_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 41, 240, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('ITEMS LOOTED', 6, 41 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) if (MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED) then addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND)) else addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_NEGATIVE_BACKGROUND)) end MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_ITEMS_LOOTED = drawroundrect(220, 41, 20, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('X', 228, 41 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfontsize(7)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
foreach lootingitem ItemEntry do if (MMH.SHOW_ALL_ITEMS or ItemEntry.amountlooted > 0) then ITEM_LOOTED_QUANTITY = ItemEntry.amountlooted ITEM_LOOTED_WORTH = ItemEntry.sellprice * ITEM_LOOTED_QUANTITY
if (MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED) then setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2)
setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_SourceOver) drawitem(ItemEntry.id, 6, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 50, 100) setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_Automatic)
drawtext(((#ItemEntry.name > 16 and string.match(string.sub(ItemEntry.name, 1, 16), '(.-)%s?$') .. '...') or ItemEntry.name):capitalizeall(), 28, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(130, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(num(ITEM_LOOTED_QUANTITY) .. ' (' .. math.floor(ITEM_LOOTED_WORTH / 100) / 10 .. 'K)', 136, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1 end
ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH = ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH + ITEM_LOOTED_WORTH end end
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext('Total: ' .. num(ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH) .. ' GPs', 6, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1
setfontsize(8)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.SECTION_HEADER_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('SUPPLIES USED', 6, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) if (MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED) then addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND)) else addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_NEGATIVE_BACKGROUND)) end MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_SUPPLIES_USED = drawroundrect(220, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 20, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('X', 228, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfontsize(7)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
foreach supplyitem ItemEntry do if (MMH.SHOW_ALL_SUPPLIES or ItemEntry.amountused > 0) then SUPPLY_USED_QUANTITY = ItemEntry.amountused SUPPLY_USED_WORTH = ItemEntry.buyprice * SUPPLY_USED_QUANTITY
if (MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED) then setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2)
setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_SourceOver) drawitem(ItemEntry.id, 6, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 50, 100) setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_Automatic)
drawtext(((#ItemEntry.name > 16 and string.match(string.sub(ItemEntry.name, 1, 16), '(.-)%s?$') .. '...') or ItemEntry.name):capitalizeall(), 28, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(130, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(num(SUPPLY_USED_QUANTITY) .. ' (' .. math.floor(SUPPLY_USED_WORTH / 100) / 10 .. 'K)', 136, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1 end
SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH = SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH + SUPPLY_USED_WORTH end end
if (MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED) then setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2)
setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_SourceOver) drawitem(3031, 6, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 50, 100) setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_Automatic)
drawtext('Money Spent', 28, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(130, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(num($moneyspent) .. ' (' .. math.floor($moneyspent / 100) / 10 .. 'K)', 136, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1 end
SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH = SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH + $moneyspent
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext('Total: ' .. num(SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH) .. ' GPs', 6, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1
setfontsize(8)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) if (ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH >= SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH) then addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND)) else addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_NEGATIVE_BACKGROUND)) end drawroundrect(0, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 20, 2, 2) drawtext(((ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH >= SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH and ('PROFIT: ')) or ('WASTE: ')) .. num(ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH - SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH) .. ' GPs (' .. math.abs(math.floor(((ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH - SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH) * 3600) / ($charactertime / 1000) / 100) / 10) .. ' k/h)', 6, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)

HUDScript.name: RecentLoot
HUDScript.script:
init start REGEX_LOOT = '^Loot of ?a?n? (.-): (.+)$' --TEMP FIX local warnItems = {"Zaoan sword", "swamplair armor", "spirit container", "behemoth trophy", "boots of haste", "souleater trophy", "steel boots", "royal helmet", "zaoan sword", "terra legs", "spellbook of mind control", "terra mantle", "sacred tree amulet", "terra amulet", "noble axe", "war axe", "mercenary sword", "behemoth claw", "medusa shield", "crown armor", "guardian halberd", "tower shield", "giant sword", "wand of cosmic energy", "warrior helmet", "stone skin amulet", "titan axe", "knight armor"} -- you can add more items here local maxLines = 10 -- max lines to display at once
local lootMsgs = {} table.lower(warnItems) init end
setfontstyle('Tahoma', 7, 75, 0xFFFFFF, 1, 0x000000)
foreach newmessage m do local creature, loot = m.content:match(REGEX_LOOT) if loot then local message, color = m.content, 0xFFFFFF
for k, v in ipairs(warnItems) do if loot:lower():find(v, 1, false) then color = 0xFF0000 break end end
table.insert(lootMsgs, 1, {message = message, color = color}) end end
while #lootMsgs > maxLines do table.remove(lootMsgs) end
for k, msg in ipairs(lootMsgs) do setfontcolor(msg.color)
drawtext(msg.message, 0, k * 10) end setposition($worldwin.left + 3, $worldwin.bottom - #lootMsgs * 10 - 13)

HUDScript.name: Xyz
HUDScript.script:
auto(200) setposition($worldwin.left, $worldwin.bottom-300)
local info = $cursorinfo addtext('x: '..$posx..", y: "..$posy..", z:"..$posz .. ". ID: "..info.id.." ("..info.count..")", 0, 0)

HUDScript.name: ShowWaypoints
HUDScript.script:
init start -- local SCRIPT_VERSION = '1.0.0'
local waypointColors = { walk = 0xAAF200, node = 0x2A0736, stand = 0x00AACC, shovel = 0xEB8540, rope = 0xFFCC00, machete = 0x003366, ladder = 0xC55186, use = 0x36693E, action = 0x00FFFF, lure = 0xCCCCCC }
local xOffset, yOffset, worldWidth, worldHeight, x, y, z, topLeftTilePos, botRightTilePos, width, height, text, label local waypointRect = {}
function gettilepos(x, y, z) local tile = getobjectarea(x, y, z)
if tile == nil then local xDiff, yDiff = x - $posx, y - $posy if math.abs($posx - x) <= 7 then tile = getobjectarea(x, $posy, $posz) xDiff = 0 elseif math.abs($posy - y) <= 5 then tile = getobjectarea($posx, y, $posz) yDiff = 0 else tile = getobjectarea($posx, $posy, $posz) end
-- Some strange stuff happens when you go from 0 to -1, so I'm -- adding this as a precaution. if tile ~= nil then local width, height = $worldwin.width, $worldwin.height
tile.left = tile.left + (width * xDiff) tile.right = tile.right + (width * xDiff) tile.centerx = tile.centerx + (width * xDiff) tile.top = tile.top + (height * yDiff) tile.bottom = tile.bottom + (height * yDiff) tile.centery = tile.centery + (height * yDiff) end end
return tile end
useworldhud() init end
setfontstyle('Tahoma', 7, 75, 0xFFFFFF, 1, 0x000000)
xOffset, yOffset = $worldwin.left - $clientwin.left, $worldwin.top - $clientwin.top worldWidth, worldHeight = $worldwin.right - $worldwin.left - 2, $worldwin.bottom - $worldwin.top - 2
local i = 0 foreach settingsentry e 'Cavebot/Waypoints' do x, y, z = getsetting(e, 'Coordinates'):match(REGEX_SPA_COORDS) x, y, z = tonumber(x), tonumber(y), tonumber(z)
if z == $posz then width, height = getsetting(e, 'Range'):match(REGEX_SPA_SIZE) width, height = tonumber(width), tonumber(height)
topLeftTilePos = gettilepos(x, y, z) botRightTilePos = gettilepos(x + width - 1, y + height - 1, z)
if topLeftTilePos and botRightTilePos then waypointRect.left = math.max(topLeftTilePos.left , 0) waypointRect.top = math.max(topLeftTilePos.top , 0) waypointRect.right = math.min(botRightTilePos.right , worldWidth) waypointRect.bottom = math.min(botRightTilePos.bottom, worldHeight) waypointRect.width = waypointRect.right - waypointRect.left waypointRect.height = waypointRect.bottom - waypointRect.top
if waypointRect.width > 0 and waypointRect.height > 0 then label = getsetting(e, 'Label') text = tern(#label == 0, tostring(i), label .. ' (' .. i .. ')') wptType = getsetting(e, 'Type')
setfillstyle('color', (waypointColors[wptType:lower()] or 0) + (math.floor(2.55*50)*16777216)) drawroundrect( waypointRect.left, waypointRect.top, waypointRect.width, waypointRect.height, 10, 10 )
if waypointRect.width > 10 then drawtext( string.fit(text, waypointRect.width - 10, '...', true), waypointRect.left + 5, waypointRect.top + 3 ) drawtext( string.fit(wptType, waypointRect.width - 10, '...', true), waypointRect.left + 5, waypointRect.top + 15 ) end end end end
i = i + 1 end

HUDScript.name: SpecialAreas
HUDScript.script:
init start local xOffset, yOffset, worldWidth, worldHeight, x, y, z, topLeftTilePos, botRightTilePos, width, height, avoidance, name, policy local specialAreaRect = {}
function gettilepos(x, y, z) local tile = getobjectarea(x, y, z)
if tile == nil then local xDiff, yDiff = x - $posx, y - $posy if math.abs($posx - x) <= 7 then tile = getobjectarea(x, $posy, $posz) xDiff = 0 elseif math.abs($posy - y) <= 5 then tile = getobjectarea($posx, y, $posz) yDiff = 0 else tile = getobjectarea($posx, $posy, $posz) end
-- Some strange stuff happens when you go from 0 to -1, so I'm -- adding this as a precaution. if tile ~= nil then local width, height = $worldwin.width, $worldwin.height
tile.left = tile.left + (width * xDiff) tile.right = tile.right + (width * xDiff) tile.centerx = tile.centerx + (width * xDiff) tile.top = tile.top + (height * yDiff) tile.bottom = tile.bottom + (height * yDiff) tile.centery = tile.centery + (height * yDiff) end end
return tile end
useworldhud() init end
setfontstyle('Arial', 8, 75, 0xFFFFFF, 1, 0x000000)
xOffset, yOffset = $worldwin.left - $clientwin.left, $worldwin.top - $clientwin.top worldWidth, worldHeight = $worldwin.right - $worldwin.left - 2, $worldwin.bottom - $worldwin.top - 2
foreach settingsentry e 'Cavebot/SpecialAreas' do x, y, z = getsetting(e, 'Coordinates'):match('.-(%d+).-(%d+).-(%d+)') x, y, z = tonumber(x), tonumber(y), tonumber(z)
if z == $posz then width, height = getsetting(e, 'Size'):match('(%d+).-(%d+)') width, height = tonumber(width), tonumber(height)
topLeftTilePos = gettilepos(x, y, z) botRightTilePos = gettilepos(x + width - 1, y + height - 1, z)
if topLeftTilePos and botRightTilePos then specialAreaRect.left = math.max(topLeftTilePos.left , 0) specialAreaRect.top = math.max(topLeftTilePos.top , 0) specialAreaRect.right = math.min(botRightTilePos.right , worldWidth) specialAreaRect.bottom = math.min(botRightTilePos.bottom, worldHeight) specialAreaRect.width = specialAreaRect.right - specialAreaRect.left specialAreaRect.height = specialAreaRect.bottom - specialAreaRect.top
if specialAreaRect.width > 0 and specialAreaRect.height > 0 then avoidance = tonumber(getsetting(e, 'Avoidance')) name = getsetting(e, 'Name') policy = getsetting(e, 'Policy'):gsub('[^A-Z]', '')
setfillstyle('color', color(255, 0, 0, math.round(100 - (avoidance / 4)))) drawroundrect( specialAreaRect.left, specialAreaRect.top, specialAreaRect.width, specialAreaRect.height, 10, 10 )
if specialAreaRect.width > 10 then drawtext( string.fit(name, specialAreaRect.width - 10, '...', true), specialAreaRect.left + 5, specialAreaRect.top + 3 ) drawtext( string.fit(policy, specialAreaRect.width - 10, '...', true), specialAreaRect.left + 5, specialAreaRect.top + 15 ) end end end end end

HUDScript.name: ActiveHotkeys
HUDScript.script:
init start -- local SCRIPT_VERSION = '1.0.1'
local types = {"hotkey", "persistent", "cavebot"} local fontsize = 7 local fontspacing = fontsize + 6
setfontstyle("Tahoma", fontsize, 99, 0xE4B31B, 1) setmaskcolorxp(0) init end
local row = 0 for _,scripttype in ipairs(types) do local i = 0 while isscript(scripttype, i) do local listname = scriptlistname(scripttype, i)
if listname ~= "" then setfontcolor(scriptlistcolor(scripttype, i)) drawtext(listname, 2, 2 + row*fontspacing) row = row + 1 end
i = i + 1 end end
setposition($clientwin.left + 7, $worldwin.bottom - row*fontspacing - 1)

HUDScript.name: KilledMonsters
HUDScript.script:
--code by Ropiderz init start local Config = { ShowAll = true, Monsters = {"Medusa", "Serpent Spawn", "Hydra"}, Color = color(255, 100, 0), }
-- DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE
local X, Mouse = 0, {On = false, Temp = {0, 0}, Pos = {$clientwin.left, $worldwin.bottom - ((#Config.Monsters + 1) * 14)}} Killed, Time = Killed or {}, Time or tosec(os.date("%X")) filterinput(false, true, false, false)
function inputevents(e) if e.type == IEVENT_RMOUSEDOWN then Mouse.On, Mouse.Temp = true, {$cursor.x - Mouse.Pos[1], $cursor.y - Mouse.Pos[2]} elseif e.type == IEVENT_RMOUSEUP then Mouse.On = false elseif e.type == IEVENT_LMOUSEUP then Killed, Time = {}, tosec(os.date('%X')) end end
local function displaytext(text, x, y, c) local w, h = measurestring(text) X = math.max(X, w) setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(0.0, color(75, 75, 75), 0, color(45, 45, 45), 0.76, color(19, 19, 19, 0)) drawrect(x + 1, y, X + 7, h, 3, 3) setfontcolor(c) drawtext(text, x + 5, y + math.floor(h / 4) - 2) end
setfontstyle('Tahoma', 8, 75) setposition(1, 1)
init end
if Mouse.On then auto(10) Mouse.Pos = {$cursor.x - Mouse.Temp[1], $cursor.y - Mouse.Temp[2]} end
foreach newmessage m do if m.type == 19 then local Monster, Loot = m.content:match("Loot of (.+): (.+)")
if Monster then Monster = Monster:gsub("a ", "", 1):gsub("an ", "", 1):gsub("the ", "", 1) Killed[Monster:lower()] = (Killed[Monster:lower()] or 0) + 1 end end end
local x, y = unpack(Mouse.Pos)
if Config.ShowAll then for _, Name in ipairs(Config.Monsters) do local Amount = Killed[Name:lower()] if Amount then displaytext(string.format("[%s] Killed: %s | Rate: %s/HR", Name:gsub("(%a)([%w_']*)", function(a, b) return a:upper()..b:lower() end), num(Amount), num(math.floor((Amount / (tosec(os.date('%X')) - Time)) * 3600))), x, y, Config.Color) y = y + 14 end end end local Total = 0 for _, Name in ipairs(Config.Monsters) do Total = Total + (Killed[Name:lower()] or 0) end displaytext(string.format("Total Killed: %s | Rate: %s/HR | Time: %s", num(Total), num(math.floor((Total / (tosec(os.date('%X')) - Time) * 3600))), time(tosec(os.date('%X')) - Time)), x, y, Config.Color)

CavebotScript.name: UtitoTempo
CavebotScript.script:
auto(100) local Monsters = {"medusa", "serpent spawn", "hydra", "behemoth"} local MinAmount = tonumber(getuseroption("AmounttoUtito")) local MonsterPercentHealth = 40 local ManaMin = 700
local UtitoAmount = 0
foreach creature m 'ms' do if m.dist <= 4 then local namelower = m.name:lower() if table.find(Monsters, namelower) and m.hppc > MonsterPercentHealth then UtitoAmount = UtitoAmount + 1 end end end
listas(UtitoAmount) if UtitoAmount >= MinAmount and $targeting and cancastspell("utito tempo") and $mp > ManaMin and $strenghtentime < 1000 and getuseroption("UtitoTempo") then cast("utito tempo") wait(1000) end

CavebotScript.name: ExoriMin
Settings
CavebotScript.script:
auto(100)
if maround(6, "Medusa", "Serpent Spawn", "Hydra") > 3 then setsetting('PotionHealer/Rules/UHP/ConditionValue', '55 to 60%') setsetting('PotionHealer/Rules/GHP/Enabled', 'no') else setsetting('PotionHealer/Rules/UHP/ConditionValue', '40 to 45%') if tonumber(getuseroption("MaxGHP")) > 0 then setsetting('PotionHealer/Rules/GHP/ConditionValue', '55 to 60%') setsetting('PotionHealer/Rules/GHP/Enabled', 'yes') end
end
if getuseroption("FollowAttackwhenlowHP") then setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Serpent Spawn/Setting1/AttackMode', 'Chase / Offensive') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Hydra/Setting2/AttackMode', 'Chase / Offensive') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Medusa/Setting2/AttackMode', 'Chase / Offensive') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Serpent Spawn/Setting2/Stance', 'No Movement') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Hydra/Setting2/Stance', 'No Movement') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Medusa/Setting2/Stance', 'No Movement') else setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Serpent Spawn/Setting1/AttackMode', 'No Change') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Hydra/Setting2/AttackMode', 'No Change') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Medusa/Setting2/AttackMode', 'No Change') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Serpent Spawn/Setting2/Stance', 'Reach') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Hydra/Setting2/Stance', 'Reach') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Medusa/Setting2/Stance', 'Reach') end
if getuseroption("AutoMount") and not $mounted and maround(10, "Medusa", "Serpent Spawn") == 0 and $lootsaround == 0 and $mppc > 55 then mount() wait(1200) end
if not $pzone and not $hasted and ($wptsection ~= "Floor1") and ($wptsection ~= "Floor2")and ($wptsection ~= "Floor3") and $standtime < 5000 then cast("utani hur") wait(300,500) end
if not $pzone and not $hasted and $standtime < 5000 and not $targeting and getuseroption("KeepHasted") then cast("utani hur") wait(10000) end
if getuseroption("ValuableOnly") then setsetting('Looting/OnlyOpenValuableBodies', 'yes') setsetting('Looting/ValuableBodiesValue', tonumber(getuseroption("ValuableGP"))) else setsetting('Looting/OnlyOpenValuableBodies', 'no') end
if tonumber(getuseroption("MaxGHP")) > 0 and itemcount("great health potion") < tonumber(getuseroption("MaxGHP")) then --means user is buying ghp setsetting('Looting/LootList/great health potion/LootingDestination', 'mainbp') else setsetting('Looting/LootList/great health potion/LootingDestination', 'lootbp') end
if maround(10, "Phantasm") > 0 then if (paround(10) == 0 and getuseroption("SafeExori")) or (not getuseroption("SafeExori")) then beep() shootarearune("great fireball rune", 1, "Phantasm") waitping(2,3) flashclient() end end

CavebotScript.name: AntiFurniture
CavebotScript.script:
init start local Weapon = "machete" local MaxWait = 120
-- DO NOT EDIT BELOW --
AntiFurniture = AntiFurniture or {_data = {}, _houseitems = {}}
function AntiFurniture.Update() AntiFurniture._data = {}
-- get all the tiles we can for x = SCREEN_LEFT, SCREEN_RIGHT do for y = SCREEN_TOP, SCREEN_BOTTOM do local pos, house = {x = x + $posx, y = y + $posy, z = $posz}, false local tile = gettile(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z) local info = iteminfo(topitem(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z).id)
if info.isunpass and not info.isunmove and tilereachable(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z, false) then -- we got a valid block item for _, item in ipairs(AntiFurniture._houseitems) do -- check if its not an item caught on a house earlier if item.x == pos.x and item.y == pos.y and item.z == pos.z then house = true break end end -- its a new house or valid item if not house then table.insert(AntiFurniture._data, {x = pos.x, y = pos.y, z = pos.z, id = info.id, tile = tile}) end end end end
-- sort tiles for the closer one table.sort(AntiFurniture._data, function(a, b) if math.max(math.abs($posx - a.x), math.abs($posy - a.y)) == math.max(math.abs($posx - b.x), math.abs($posy - b.y)) then if math.abs($posx - a.x) == math.abs($posx - b.x) then if math.abs($posy - a.y) == math.abs($posy - b.y) then return a.id < b.id else return math.abs($posy - a.y) < math.abs($posy - b.y) end else return math.abs($posx - a.x) < math.abs($posx - b.x) end else return math.max(math.abs($posx - a.x), math.abs($posy - a.y)) < math.max(math.abs($posx - b.x), math.abs($posy - b.y)) end end)
end
Weapon = itemid(Weapon)
init end
auto(2000)
if clientitemhotkey(Weapon, "crosshair") == '' and itemcount(Weapon) == 0 then return end
if $standtime >= math.max(MaxWait or 0, 0) * 1000 then -- we're waited for too long! AntiFurniture.Update()
for i, item in pairs(AntiFurniture._data) do -- check if we got something to break local x, y, z, id, house = item.x, item.y, item.z, item.id, false
reachlocation(x, y, z) waitping()
while id == topitem(x, y, z).id and tilereachable(x, y, z, false) do -- dont stop till we rock it useitemon(Weapon, id, ground(x, y, z)) waitping(1.9, 2.1)
foreach newmessage m do if m.content:match("You are not invited") then -- we're entering a house, we should stop house = table.remove(AntiFurniture._data, i) break end end
if house then -- add our house to the known house items return table.insert(AntiFurniture._houseitems, house) end end end end

CavebotScript.name: Flask
CavebotScript.script:
init start
local minAmount = 30 local randMinAmount = minAmount
init end
auto(1000, 3000) dontlist()
if flasks() >= randMinAmount and $cap < 200 then if maround() ~= 0 then wait(500, 1000) else pausewalking(10000)
for i = 283, 285 do if itemcount(i) > 0 then moveitems(i, 'ground') waitping() end end
pausewalking(0)
end randMinAmount = math.random(minAmount - 5, minAmount + 5) end

CavebotScript.name: ExoriGranIco
CavebotScript.script:
auto(100) local val = getuseroption("AvgtoExoriGranIco") local hpMin = val.from local hpMax = val.to
if maround(5, "Medusa", "Hydra", "Serpent Spawn", "Behemoth") <= 2 and $attacked.dist <= 2 then if $attacked.name == "Medusa" or $attacked.name == "Hydra" or $attacked.name == "Serpent Spawn" or $attacked.name == "Eternal Guardian" then if (($attacked.hppc / 100) * creatureinfo($target.name).hp >= hpMin) and (($attacked.hppc / 100) * creatureinfo($target.name).hp <= hpMax) then if cancastspell("exori gran ico") and getuseroption("ExoriGranIco") then cast("exori gran ico") end end end end if ($attacked.id ~= 0) and ($attacked.isshootable) and (maround(3, "Medusa", "Serpent Spawn", "Hydra", "Eternal Guardian", "Behemoth") < 3 or paround(10) > 0) then if cancastspell('exori hur') and ($attacked.dist <= 4) then cast('exori hur') elseif cancastspell('exori ico')and ($attacked.dist <= 2)then cast('exori ico') end end

CavebotScript.name: ExoriMas
CavebotScript.script: auto(100) if ($attacked.name == "Medusa" or $attacked.name == "Hydra" or $attacked.name == "Serpent Spawn") and ($attacked.dist > 1 and $attacked.dist <= 3) and $attacked.hppc < 15 then if cancastspell("exori mas") and ( (paround(10) == 0 and getuseroption("SafeExori")) or not getuseroption("SafeExori")) then cast("exori mas") end end

CavebotScript.name: Refill
CavebotScript.script:
auto(1000) local ManaNameIs = "mana potion" local Health1 = "ultimate health potion" local Health2 = "great health potion"
local ManaMinis = tonumber(getuseroption("MinMana")) local Health1Minis = tonumber(getuseroption("MinUHP")) local Health2Minis = tonumber(getuseroption("MinGHP"))
local MinCapIs = tonumber(getuseroption("MinCap"))
if ($wptsection == "Floor1" or $wptsection == "Floor2" or $wptsection == "Floor3") then if itemcount(ManaNameIs) < (ManaMinis) or itemcount(Health1) < (Health1Minis) or itemcount(Health2) < (Health2Minis) or $cap < (MinCapIs) or ($stamina <= 60 * 15 and getuseroption("OfflineTrain")) or (maround(10, "Phantasm") > 0) then
if $posz == 14 then stopattack() setlooting("no") settargeting("no") gotolabel("LeaveFloor3", "Leave") wait(10000) elseif $posz == 13 then stopattack() setlooting("no") settargeting("no") gotolabel("LeaveFloor2", "Leave") wait(10000) elseif $posz == 12 then stopattack() setlooting("no") settargeting("no") gotolabel("LeaveFloor1", "Leave") wait(10000) end end end

CavebotScript.name: Stances
CavebotScript.script:
auto(100) if maround(10, "medusa", "serpent spawn", "hydra", "behemoth") >= 2 then setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Serpent Spawn/Setting1/Health', '85 to 100%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Serpent Spawn/Setting2/Health', '0 to 85%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Hydra/Setting1/Health', '85 to 100%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Hydra/Setting2/Health', '0 to 85%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Medusa/Setting1/Health', '85 to 100%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Medusa/Setting2/Health', '0 to 85%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Behemoth/Setting1/Health', '85 to 100%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Behemoth/Setting2/Health', '0 to 85%') elseif maround(8, "medusa", "serpent spawn", "hydra", "behemoth") == 1 and getuseroption("Ignore1Monster") and ($wptsection == "Floor1" or $wptsection == "Floor2" or $wptsection == "Floor3") then setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Serpent Spawn/Setting1/Health', '0 to 0%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Serpent Spawn/Setting2/Health', '0 to 70%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Hydra/Setting1/Health', '0 to 0%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Hydra/Setting2/Health', '0 to 70%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Medusa/Setting1/Health', '0 to 0%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Medusa/Setting2/Health', '0 to 60%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Behemoth/Setting1/Health', '0 to 0%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Behemoth/Setting2/Health', '0 to 70%') elseif $standtime > 20000 then setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Serpent Spawn/Setting1/Health', '85 to 100%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Serpent Spawn/Setting2/Health', '0 to 85%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Hydra/Setting1/Health', '85 to 100%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Hydra/Setting2/Health', '0 to 85%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Medusa/Setting1/Health', '85 to 100%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Medusa/Setting2/Health', '0 to 85%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Behemoth/Setting1/Health', '85 to 100%') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Behemoth/Setting2/Health', '0 to 85%') end
if maround(7, "Eternal Guardian") > 3 then setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Eternal Guardian/Setting1/Health', '0 to 100%') else setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Eternal Guardian/Setting1/Health', '0 to 30%') end

CavebotScript.name: Exanapox
CavebotScript.script:
auto(100) if $poisoned and $pzone then cast("exana pox") wait(1000) elseif $poisoned and not $pzone and $standtime > 2000 and maround(10, "Serpent Spawn", "Medusa", "Earth Elemental", "Souleater", "Phantasm") == 0 and $posz > 11 then cast("exana pox") wait(1000) end
if $pzone and $hppc < 100 then cast("exura ico") wait(1000) end

CavebotScript.name: ExoriExoriGran
CavebotScript.script:
-- -- ____ __ __ ______ -- /\ _`\ /\ \ __/\ \/\__ _\ -- \ \ \L\ \ __ __ __ \ \ \/\ \ \ \/_/\ \/ -- \ \ _ <'/\ \/\ \ /'_ `\\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ -- \ \ \L\ \ \ \_\ \/\ \L\ \\ \ \_/ \_\ \ \ \ \ -- \ \____/\ \____/\ \____ \\ `\___x___/ \ \_\ -- \/___/ \/___/ \/___L\ \'\/__//__/ \/_/ -- /\____/ -- \_/__/ --- init start local SAFELIST = {"BUg", "LadyBUg", "WedNesDay", "sirmate", "Arv Sta", "Chael"}
local MONSTERS = {"Medusa", "Serpent Spawn", "Hydra", "Souleater", "Behemoth", "Eternal Guardian", "Acid Blob", "Frost Dragon", "Earth Elemental"} local SPELLS = { FIRST = {words = "exori gran", mp = 340, count = 2}, SECOND = {words = "exori", mp = 300, count = 1}, } local AREAS = { } local function insideArea() if getuseroption("SafeExori") then for _, SPECIAL_AREA in ipairs(AREAS) do if ($posx >= SPECIAL_AREA[1][1] and $posy >= SPECIAL_AREA[1][2] and $posx <= SPECIAL_AREA[2][1] and $posy <= SPECIAL_AREA[2][2] and $posz == SPECIAL_AREA[3]) then return true end end end
return false end
init end auto(100) if getuseroption("SafeExori") then if (paround(10) - paround(10, unpack(SAFELIST))) == 0 and not insideArea() then if maround(1, unpack(MONSTERS)) >= SPELLS.FIRST.count and $attacked.id ~= 0 then if $mp >= SPELLS.FIRST.mp and cooldown(SPELLS.FIRST.words) < 500 then cast(SPELLS.FIRST.words) end if $mp >= SPELLS.SECOND.mp and $attacked.id ~= 0 and cooldown(SPELLS.SECOND.words) < 500 then cast(SPELLS.SECOND.words) end elseif maround(1, unpack(MONSTERS)) >= SPELLS.SECOND.count and $attacked.id ~= 0 then if $mp >= SPELLS.SECOND.mp and cooldown(SPELLS.SECOND.words) < 500 then cast(SPELLS.SECOND.words) end end end elseif not getuseroption("SafeExori") then if maround(1, unpack(MONSTERS)) >= SPELLS.FIRST.count and $attacked.id ~= 0 then if $mp >= SPELLS.FIRST.mp and cooldown(SPELLS.FIRST.words) < 500 then cast(SPELLS.FIRST.words) end if $mp >= SPELLS.SECOND.mp and $attacked.id ~= 0 and cooldown(SPELLS.SECOND.words) < 500 then cast(SPELLS.SECOND.words) end elseif maround(1, unpack(MONSTERS)) >= SPELLS.SECOND.count and $attacked.id ~= 0 then if $mp >= SPELLS.SECOND.mp and cooldown(SPELLS.SECOND.words) < 500 then cast(SPELLS.SECOND.words) end end end

CavebotScript.name: RingsAmulet
CavebotScript.script:
auto(100) AmuletName = getuseroption("NecklaceToUse") RingName = getuseroption("RingToUse")
if $wptsection == "Floor1" or $wptsection == "Floor2" or $wptsection == "Floor3" then
if itemcount(AmuletName) > 0 and getuseroption("UseNecklaces") and $neck.id ~= 3083 then moveitems(AmuletName, "neck", "all", 100) wait(300,500) elseif itemcount("Terra Amulet") > 0 and getuseroption("UseTerraAmulet") and $neck.id == 0 then moveitems("terra Amulet", "neck", "all", 100) wait(300,500) end
if $finger.id == 0 then if itemcount(RingName) > 0 and getuseroption("UseRings") then moveitems(RingName, "finger", "all", 100) wait(300,500) elseif itemcount("Ring of Healing") > 0 and getuseroption("UseROH") then moveitems("ring of healing", "finger", "all", 100) wait(300,500) elseif itemcount("Life ring") > 0 and getuseroption("UseLifeRing") then moveitems("life ring", "finger", "all", 100) wait(300,500) end end end

CavebotScript.name: SafeBank
CavebotScript.script: auto(200) foreach newmessage m do if m.type == MSG_NPC and m.content == "There is not enough gold on your account." then if getuseroption("OfflineTrain") then gotolabel(0, "OfflineTrainer") else printerror("Not enough money in bank.") logout() setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'no') end end end

CavebotScript.name: FlaskDrop
CavebotScript.script:
init start
local minAmount = 30 local randMinAmount = minAmount
init end
auto(1000, 3000) dontlist()
if flasks() >= randMinAmount and $cap < 300 then if maround() ~= 0 then wait(500, 1000) else pausewalking(10000)
for i = 283, 285 do if itemcount(i) > 0 then moveitems(i, 'ground') waitping() end end
pausewalking(0)
end randMinAmount = math.random(minAmount - 5, minAmount + 5) end

CavebotScript.name: PlayerAlarm
CavebotScript.script: --Temporary fix for alarm auto(100) if paround(10) > 0 and ($wptsection == "Floor1" or $wptsection == "Floor2" or $wptsection == "Floor3") and getuseroption("PlayerAlarm") then playsound("playeronscreen.wav") wait(200,500) end

CavebotScript.name: DP
CavebotScript.script: auto(10000) if $standtime > (60000*10) and $pzone and $connected then logout() messagebox("Error", "You have been standing on same square for 10 mins. Cavebot has been turned off.") setcavebot("no") elseif $cap < 10 and $wptsection == "Town" and $connected and $pzone then logout() messagebox("Error", "You have less than 10 cap. Cavebot has been turned off.") setcavebot("no") end

Waypoint.script:
--Finding your location
if $posz == 7 or $posz == 6 then gotolabel(0, "Town") elseif $posz == 11 then gotolabel(0, "ReadyToHunt") elseif $posz == 13 then gotolabel(0, "Floor2") elseif $posz == 14 then gotolabel(0, "Floor3") else messagebox("Error", "Please start the script at depot/bank/banuta doors/ or hydra egg") beep() setcavebot("no") end
--Location check if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("InDepot", "Town") end closewindows() setsetting('Looting/OpenNextBP', 'no')

Waypoint.label: Open2BPS
Waypoint.script:
--Open 2 backpacks setsetting('Looting/OpenNextBP', 'no') local lootbp = getuseroption("LootBP") local maindpbp = getuseroption("MainDP")
closewindows() wait(2000) while windowcount() < 2 do closewindows() wait(500,1200) openitem(0, "back", true) wait(500,1200) resizewindows() wait(500,1200) openitem(lootbp,0,true) wait(500,1200) resizewindows() end
openitem(0, "back", true)
setsetting('Cavebot/WalkThroughPlayers', 'no')
while windowcount("Depot Chest") == 0 do opendepot() wait(300) end
while windowcount(maindpbp) == 0 do openitem(maindpbp, "Depot Chest") wait(300,500) resizewindows(1000,maindpbp) wait(300,500) end
wait(1000)

Waypoint.label: ReachDP
Waypoint.script:
--Reach Depot/Open Dp/Deposit setsetting('Looting/OpenNextBP', 'no') waitping()
stackdp = getuseroption("StackDP") nonstackdp = getuseroption("LootDP") lootbp = getuseroption("LootBP") maindpbp = getuseroption("MainDP")
local CONFIG = { LOOT_BACKPACK = lootbp, MAIN_DP_BACKPACK = maindpbp, STACKABLE_BACKPACK = stackdp, NOT_STACKABLE_BACKPACK = nonstackdp, }
clearlastonto()
while (true) do foreach lootingitem ITEM_ENTRY do while (itemcount(ITEM_ENTRY.id, CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK) > 0) do if (itemproperty(ITEM_ENTRY.id, ITEM_STACKABLE)) then moveitemsonto(ITEM_ENTRY.id, CONFIG.STACKABLE_BACKPACK, 1, CONFIG.MAIN_DP_BACKPACK, CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK) wait(600, 1200) else moveitemsonto(ITEM_ENTRY.id, CONFIG.NOT_STACKABLE_BACKPACK, $lastonto, CONFIG.MAIN_DP_BACKPACK, CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK) wait(600, 200) end end end
if (itemcount(CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK, CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK) > 0) then openitem(CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK, CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK, false) waitcontainer(CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK, false) else break end
wait(100) end
closewindows() wait(1000)

--##########Opening BPS##########-- local supplybp = getuseroption("SuppliesBP") local miscbp = getuseroption("MiscBP") local extrasupplybp = getuseroption("ExtraSuppliesBP")
while windowcount() < 1 do closewindows() waitping(6,8) openitem(0, "back", true) waitping(6,8) resizewindows() end
-- if getuseroption("UseExtraSupplyBp") and windowcount() >= 2 and itemcount(extrasupplybp) > 0 then -- while windowcount(extrasupplybp) ~= 1 do -- openitem(extrasupplybp,0,true) -- wait(500,800) -- resizewindows() -- end -- end
if (getuseroption("UseNecklaces") or getuseroption("UseRings")) and itemcount(miscbp) > 0 then while windowcount(miscbp) ~= 1 do openitem(miscbp,0,true) waitping(4,8) end end resizewindows() minimizewindows('equip')

--##########Opening MISC BP##########-- setsetting('Looting/OpenNextBP', 'no') local BagName = getuseroption("BagDP")
while windowcount("Depot Chest") == 0 do opendepot() waitping(3,5) end
if itemcount(BagName, "Depot Chest") > 0 then while windowcount(BagName) == 0 and itemcount(BagName, "Depot Chest") > 0 do openitem(BagName,false) waitping(3,5) end else gotolabel("ToBank", "Town") end

--########## AMULETS ##########--
local ItemName = getuseroption("NecklaceToUse") local ItemMax = tonumber(getuseroption('AmountofNecklaces')) local BptoMove = getuseroption('MiscBP') local BpFrom = getuseroption('AmuletsDP') local BagName = getuseroption("BagDP")
if itemcount(BpFrom,BagName) > 0 then while windowcount(BpFrom) ~= 1 do openitem(BpFrom, BagName, true) waitping(3,5) end else gotolabel($wptid + 1) end
while (ItemMax - itemcount(ItemName,BptoMove) > 0) and (itemcount(BpFrom,BpFrom) > 0 or itemcount(ItemName, BpFrom) > 0) and getcontainer(BptoMove).emptycount > 1 do moveitems(ItemName, BptoMove, BpFrom,1) wait(1000)
if itemcount(ItemName, BpFrom) == 0 and itemcount(BpFrom,BpFrom) > 0 then openitem(BpFrom,BpFrom,false) wait(200,400) end end
closewindows(BpFrom) waitping(3,4)

--########## RINGS ##########--
local ItemName = getuseroption("RingToUse") local ItemMax = tonumber(getuseroption('AmountofRing')) local BptoMove = getuseroption('MiscBP') local BpFrom = getuseroption('RingsDP') local BagName = getuseroption("BagDP")
if itemcount(BpFrom,BagName) > 0 then while windowcount(BpFrom) ~= 1 do openitem(BpFrom, BagName, true) waitping(3,5) end else gotolabel($wptid + 1) end
while (ItemMax - itemcount(ItemName,BptoMove) > 0) and (itemcount(BpFrom,BpFrom) > 0 or itemcount(ItemName, BpFrom) > 0) and getcontainer(BptoMove).emptycount > 1 do moveitems(ItemName, BptoMove, BpFrom,1) wait(1000)
if itemcount(ItemName, BpFrom) == 0 and itemcount(BpFrom,BpFrom) > 0 then openitem(BpFrom,BpFrom,false) wait(200,400) end end
closewindows(BpFrom) waitping(3,4)

--########## UHP ##########--
local ItemName = "ultimate health potion" local ItemMax = tonumber(getuseroption('MaxUHP')) local BptoMove = getuseroption('MainBP') local BpFrom = getuseroption('UHPDP') local BagName = getuseroption("BagDP")
if itemcount(BpFrom,BagName) > 0 then while windowcount(BpFrom) ~= 1 do openitem(BpFrom, BagName, true) waitping(3,5) end else gotolabel($wptid + 1) end
while (ItemMax - itemcount(ItemName,BptoMove) > 0) and (itemcount(BpFrom,BpFrom) > 0 or itemcount(ItemName, BpFrom) > 0) and getcontainer(BptoMove).emptycount > 1 do moveitemsupto(ItemName,ItemMax, BptoMove, BpFrom) wait(1000)
if itemcount(ItemName, BpFrom) == 0 and itemcount(BpFrom,BpFrom) > 0 then openitem(BpFrom,BpFrom,false) wait(1000,2000) end end
closewindows(BpFrom) waitping(3,4)

--########## GHP ##########--
local ItemName = "great health potion" local ItemMax = tonumber(getuseroption('MaxGHP')) local BptoMove = getuseroption('MainBP') local BpFrom = getuseroption('GHPDP') local BagName = getuseroption("BagDP")
if itemcount(BpFrom,BagName) > 0 then while windowcount(BpFrom) ~= 1 do openitem(BpFrom, BagName, true) waitping(3,5) end else gotolabel($wptid + 1) end
while (ItemMax - itemcount(ItemName,BptoMove) > 0) and (itemcount(BpFrom,BpFrom) > 0 or itemcount(ItemName, BpFrom) > 0) and getcontainer(BptoMove).emptycount > 1 do moveitemsupto(ItemName,ItemMax, BptoMove, BpFrom,ItemMax) wait(1000)
if itemcount(ItemName, BpFrom) == 0 and itemcount(BpFrom,BpFrom) > 0 then openitem(BpFrom,BpFrom,false) wait(1000,2000) end end
closewindows(BpFrom) waitping(3,4)
--Walk through players? closewindows() if getuseroption("WalkThruPlayer") then setsetting('Cavebot/WalkThroughPlayers', 'yes') else setsetting('Cavebot/WalkThroughPlayers', 'no') end

--Close MISC bp / Open 2 BPS / Talk to Bank NPC local MiscBP = getuseroption("MiscBP") local supplybp = getuseroption("SuppliesBP") local extrasupplybp = getuseroption("ExtraSuppliesBP")
if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("ToBank", "Town") else setsetting('Cavebot/WalkThroughPlayers', 'yes')
closewindows() wait(2000) while windowcount() < 2 do closewindows() waitping(4,5) openitem(0, "back", true) waitping(4,5) resizewindows() waitping(4,5) openitem(supplybp,0,true) waitping(4,5) resizewindows() end
if getuseroption("UseExtraSupplyBp") and windowcount() >= 2 and itemcount(extrasupplybp) > 0 then while windowcount(extrasupplybp) ~= 1 do openitem(extrasupplybp,0,true) waitping(4,5) resizewindows() end end
end

--Withdraw money for supplies
local ManaMax = getuseroption("MaxMana") local GHPMAX = getuseroption("MaxGHP") local UHPMAX = getuseroption("MaxUHP")
Mana = math.positive(ManaMax - itemcount("mana potion")) * 50 GHP = math.positive(GHPMAX - itemcount("great health potion")) * 190 UHP = math.positive(UHPMAX - itemcount("ultimate health potion")) * 310 Currentsofts = itemcount(6530) * 10000
Total = math.ceil(Mana+GHP+UHP+Currentsofts, 10000) + 10000
if islocation(1) then npctalk("hi", "deposit all", "yes", "withdraw "..Total, "yes", "balance") end
if $cap < 20 then beep() printerror("WARNING! Cavebot has been turned off due to low cap. This is to avoid losing money.") logout() setcavebot("no") end

--Location check/Buy supplies if islocation(1) then
npctalk("hi", "flask", "yes") while flasks() > 0 and $standtime < 10000 do npctalk("yes") waitping(1,2) end
sellflasks() local mainbp = getuseroption("MainBP") local supplybp = getuseroption("SuppliesBP") local extrasupplybp = getuseroption("ExtraSuppliesBP")
local ManaMax = getuseroption("MaxMana") local GHPMAX = getuseroption("MaxGHP") local UHPMAX = getuseroption("MaxUHP") local GFBMAX = getuseroption("MaxGFB")
--GFB if getuseroption("HuntFloor3") then buyitemsupto("great fireball rune",GFBMAX) waitping(3,4) moveitems("great fireball rune",supplybp, mainbp) end
--GHP amount2 = tonumber(GHPMAX) - itemcount("great health potion") while amount2 > 0 and islocation(1) do buyitems("great health potion", amount2) waitping(2,3) -- if getcontainer(supplybp).emptycount > 0 then -- moveitems("great health potion",supplybp, mainbp) -- else -- moveitems("great health potion",extrasupplybp, mainbp) -- end -- waitping(2,3) amount2 = amount2-100 end
--UHP amount3 = tonumber(UHPMAX) - itemcount("ultimate health potion") while amount3 > 0 and islocation(1) do buyitems("ultimate health potion", amount3) waitping(2,3) -- if getcontainer(supplybp).emptycount > 0 then -- moveitems("ultimate health potion",supplybp, mainbp) -- else -- moveitems("ultimate health potion",extrasupplybp, mainbp) -- end -- waitping(2,3) amount3 = amount3-100 end
--MANAS amount1 = tonumber(ManaMax) - itemcount("mana potion") while amount1 > 0 and islocation(1) do buyitems("mana potion", amount1) waitping(2,3) if getcontainer(supplybp).emptycount > 0 then moveitems("mana potion",supplybp, mainbp) else moveitems("mana potion",extrasupplybp, mainbp) end waitping(2,3) amount1 = amount1-100 end
end

--Location check / Check supplies if not islocation(2) then gotolabel("ToManaShop", "Town") else local ManaMax = getuseroption("MaxMana") local GHPMAX = getuseroption("MaxGHP") local UHPMAX = getuseroption("MaxUHP")
if itemcount("mana potion") < tonumber(ManaMax) or itemcount("great health potion") < tonumber(GHPMAX) or itemcount("ultimate health potion") < tonumber(UHPMAX) then closewindows() gotolabel("ToBank", "Town") end end
